additionalInformation: For strength heroes, it grants 60 health, 0.3 health regen and 3 attack damage.
For agility heroes, it grants 60 health and 0.3 health regen.
For intelligence heroes, it grants 60 health and 0.3 health regen.
name: Gauntlets of Strength
description: Studded leather gloves that add brute strength.
